about_the_game:
Silent Investigation is a short horror game developed with Unreal Engine 5, featuring action-packed and unsettling elements of farming simulation and horror in a first-person.

( Yes, Farming Simulation + Horror Simulation! :) )

The goal of the game is to earn money through farming and fix the anomalies you encounter in your dreams. You can use the money you earn to buy tools to help you fix these anomalies. You can adopt a cat or expand your farm even further. While trying to fix the anomalies, you must remain quiet. Additionally, you should avoid attracting the monsters' attention by walking!

While a microphone is not required to play the game, having one is recommended. Monsters may react to sounds from your microphone, enhancing your interaction with the game.

Note: The aim of the game is to provide an enjoyable, challenging, and slightly frightening farming experience. Have fun!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
